c74object.name: sp.classmatch
c74object.digest: Finds nearest class based on MFCC input
c74object.description: Finds the nearest match based on pre-trained classes/clusters.

discussion.p: The sp.classmatch object will find the nearest match in a set of pre-trained classes or clusters. The classes can be the default Sensory Percussion classes, auto-generated cluster names, or any arbitrary labels.

inlet.description: Takes incoming buffer~ name to find the nearest class match. Also takes the messages for object control.

outlet.description: The nearest match in the pre-trained classifier.
dict output for displaying on an sp.plotter.
